attributes.action: Say No To A 2nd EU Referendum. Put Britain First!!
attributes.additional_details: The vote to leave the E.U. could mark one of the key turning points in modern British history, fundamentally reorienting the country’s place in the world. Say No to a second referendum and claim back our Britain, we will survive and become a better country.
attributes.background: Today the UK won the right to leave the EU, but now the people who voted to remain want there to be a second referendum. Britain won the vote fair and square and it's not right that just because David Cameron has resigned as Prime Minister, people are now changing their mind.
